# [Interview #839, Entry #20](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=839#20)

#### WINDRUNNER

Did people exist on Nalthis prior to Endowment's arrival there?

#### BRANDON SANDERSON

Some planets had people before the shattering.
